title: RugbyFundX
summary: Kenyan rugby's talent is rich but  the sport is cash-poor. Players quit due to a lack of kits and support. Donors are hesitant because funds disappear without proof.
solution: An on-chain crowdfunding platform providing transparent fund tracking, milestone-based fund release, and active sponsor-player engagement, ensuring accountability and trust.
proposer_relevant_experience:
**Daniel Mwihoti **

**Full\-stack software developer**

A former Kenya Rugby Union player turned passionate web developer, Daniel has hands-on experience in the trenches of Kenyan rugby, from grassroots games to union-level matches. His transition from the pitch to code stems from a personal drive to fix the welfare issues he witnessed firsthand, underfunded teams and players forced to quit. With expertise in building  web applications . He looks forward to better welfare of players through rugbyfundx. Will lead in rugbyfundx development

[https://www\.linkedin\.com/in/daniel\-mwihoti\-3aaa652b9/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/daniel-mwihoti-3aaa652b9/)

**Walter Omwangu**

**Kenya nationwide level 3 coach**

Walter is a professional rugby player who has been playing since childhood and has played both kenya cup and nationwide leagues. He has spearheaded different leadership position. Will onboard players

**Herine Omollo**

**Founder of Cardano Kenya Community\.**

She will be the organizer of the event .She was a reviewer in F10 and a moderator in F11 eqipting her with hosting skills She hosted the Catalyst working group Nairobi 2024.She co-hosted the first meetup for cardano Kenya Community in 2024.Her work blends Web3 governance, funding proposal reviews, and diaspora networking, all while championing African innovation.

Sponsor & Diaspora Outreach Lead: Activates recurring donors via old boys' networks, WhatsApp groups, and event

Player Welfare Advocate: Directly engages injured/retired players for personalized campaigns (e.g., "Sponsor Humphrey's Recovery"), handling milestone verifications and thank-you loops to build trust.

[https://www\.linkedin\.com/in/herine\-omollo\-319a6033b/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/herine-omollo-319a6033b/)

sub_fields.title: Category Questions
sub_fields.description: Answer the following questions to determine the eligibility of your proposal.

sub_fields.title: Describe what makes your idea innovative compared to what has been previously launched in the market (whether by you or others).
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
Traditional donations lack transparency, donations disappear into personal accounts, no receipts and no breakdown of usage, RugbyFundX solves this with on-chain financial transparency.

Milestone-based funding automation - funds release only when milestone conditions are validated. this prevents mismanagement and build trust.

Sponsor visibilty  built into smart contracts - sponsor get proof-of-impact logs

Dual value flow - funds go to players and players support sponsors through brand engagement.

Open-source public good - entire system reusable for other sports or local community projects

sub_fields.title: Describe what your prototype or MVP will demonstrate, and where it can be accessed.
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
When you open the mvp you will get to see

- public home feed - listing 10 real pilot teams & players
- Team Dashboard (login for team captain/coach) - upload receipts/photos of how money was spent, mark milestones complete
- live transparency page - table showing every single transcation
- player /team profile

Mvp will be accessed here [https://github\.com/mwihoti/rugbyfundx](https://github.com/mwihoti/rugbyfundx) & [https://rubgyfundx\.vercel\.app/](https://rubgyfundx.vercel.app/)

sub_fields.title: Describe realistic measures of success, ideally with on-chain metrics.
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
Player and club adoption - 10 rugby clubs, 200 + players using platform.

community engagement kpis - social media telegram/discord presence

github activity metrics - open-source contribution, weekly commit history

Total value locked in donation -  Target 5000 + Ada first 6 months

Number of on-chain transcations - target 1000 + transactions within first 6-12 months, includes contributions, payouts and sponsor engagement.

Number of active wallets from players, sponsors, team and donors

sub_fields.title: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.description: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.answer:
RugbyFundX provides a decentralized crowdfunding platform on Cardano specifically designed for rugby clubs, players, and sponsors. 

The platform addresses two main problems:



Transparency in Fund Allocation: Traditional donation methods, like Mpesa and banking, leave contributors unsure of how their funds are used. RugbyFundX records all contributions on-chain, enabling real-time tracking and verifiable fund allocation. Contributors can see exactly which milestones funds are applied to, from player equipment to tournament participation.



Sponsor Engagement and Measurable ROI: Brands investing in rugby players or teams lack measurable outcomes for their contributions. RugbyFundX integrates sponsors into the platform, enabling players to promote products and services as part of campaign agreements. Smart contracts automatically track contributions and related sponsor activations, providing clear, quantifiable results.



How the Solution Works:



Fans and sponsors contribute ADA directly to smart contracts associated with players or clubs.



Funds are locked and only released upon achieving predefined milestones (e.g., completion of training programs, tournament participation).



Contributors can track progress and fund allocation through a transparent dashboard.



Players participate in brand promotion activities as agreed with sponsors, and interactions are verified on-chain.



 The platform ensures trust and accountability in rugby fundraising, empowers players with secure support, and provides measurable impact for sponsors  all while generating meaningful on-chain activity on Cardano.

sub_fields.title: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.description: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.answer:
RugbyFundX will have several positive impacts on the broader Cardano ecosystem:



Increased On-Chain Activity: Every contribution, milestone approval, and sponsor interaction is recorded on-chain, generating a measurable increase in Cardano network transactions and activity.



Expanded Use Cases for Cardano: By applying blockchain technology to sports crowdfunding, RugbyFundX demonstrates the versatility of Cardano for real-world applications beyond NFTs and financial transactions.



Enhanced Trust and Transparency: Contributors, sponsors, and the community can verify all transactions and fund allocation, promoting trust in decentralized finance and project management on Cardano.



Community Engagement and Growth: The platform encourages interaction between fans, players, and sponsors, fostering a strong, engaged community around sports projects on Cardano.



Education and Adoption: RugbyFundX serves as a practical example for other sports and social initiatives considering blockchain solutions, potentially driving broader adoption and understanding of Cardano's smart contract capabilities.



Support for Decentralized Funding Models: By providing a transparent, trustless crowdfunding platform, RugbyFundX reinforces the ethos of decentralization and accountable funding within the Cardano ecosystem.

sub_fields.title: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.description: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.answer:
Capabilities to Deliver Project



Technical Expertise: The core team has verifiable experience in Web3 development, Cardano smart contracts (Plutus), React/Next.js, and backend integrations. GitHub repositories and LinkedIn profiles are provided for transparency.



Proven Track Record: Previous projects in software development, Web3 applications, and community engagement demonstrate our ability to manage end-to-end project delivery.



Rugby Domain Knowledge: Advisory support from experienced rugby professionals ensures relevance and alignment with player and sponsor needs. Developer is a rugby player playing in nationwide



Trust and Accountability: All funds and interactions will be on-chain, providing transparent, verifiable, and immutable records of contributions, milestone achievements, and sponsor activations.



Validation of Feasibility



Testnet Deployment: Early MVP deployment on Cardano testnet to validate smart contract functionality and fund management.



Pilot User Testing: Engage a small cohort of clubs, players, and sponsors to test contribution tracking and milestone releases.



Iterative Feedback: Collect and analyze feedback, making adjustments to ensure the platform meets real-world needs.



Technical Audits: Independent review of smart contracts to ensure security and proper functionality.

sub_fields.description: What will be delivered in this milestone

Purchase of required developer laptops/workstations (2 × high-spec machines)

• Cardano node setup + dev environment (Plutus Pioneers certified)

• First Plutus smart-contract prototypes built and tested on Cardano Preprod:

  – Escrow contract for milestone-based fund release

  – Reward distribution script for recurring donor → player stipends

• Internal testnet demo: KSh 50,000 sent via tADA → automatically released when receipt uploaded

sub_fields.title: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.description: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.answer:
High ROI for Network Usage: Each contribution, milestone verification, and sponsor activation creates on-chain transactions, boosting Cardano's network activity.



Demonstrates Practical Utility: The platform showcases how blockchain can solve real-world problems in sports funding and sponsorship.



Encourages Adoption: By providing a trustless, transparent solution, RugbyFundX can attract new users and developers to the Cardano ecosystem.



Scalable Model: The solution can be adapted for other sports and community initiatives, providing long-term value and repeatable use cases for Cardano smart contracts.
